name: Socap.ai
headline: Grow your network and fundraise faster with AI √∞¬ü¬§¬ë
description:
At Socap.ai, we help founders and investors to grow their network and fundraise better with AI.

As experienced founders and investors (Slava is an ex-VC with 2 unicorns from seed portfolio and a top YC founder who has raised $180M over his entrepreneurial career; Alex is a repeat AI founder with an exit and has helped dozens of founders to raise early-stage funding), we're constantly bombarded with emails/DMs from fellow founders asking for fundraising help and intros.

We get it √¢¬Ä¬î fundraising is tough, especially in the current environment. There's so much advice that you don't even know who to listen to. With Socap.ai, we make it at least 2 times easier by giving founders a proven YC-style "parallel fundraising" playbook (remember √¢¬Ä¬î we ourselves have raised over $200M using it), an accountable community, and exclusive access to the Socap.ai platform where you can easily manage and grow your founder/investor network for your fundraising needs and beyond.

We're currently in beta and onboarding users through various community initiatives (ours or our VC/accelerator partners). Learn more and apply to one of our free fundraising bootcamps here: Socap.ai
tags: industry:b2b; industry:workflow-automation; industry:community; industry:fundraising; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Slava Solonitsyn
founders.description: Slava is an accomplished investor, and entrepreneur (top YC company Mighty Buildings - W18, Socap.ai - W23). At Mighty Buildings, he commercialized the 3D printing tech that enabled the printing of an entire building, not just walls, in a single cycle, to address the dearth of affordable housing in Silicon Valley, California, and the rest of the world. Now he is focused on helping founders & investors to grow their network and fundraise better with a new YC company Socap.ai

founders.name: Mika Melchanka
founders.description:
Serial entrepreneur, an avid learner, wearing lots of hats, and doing lots of projects.
The main area of interest are technological fusion (AI/Data analytics + traditional businesses), IoT, and sustainability.

founders.name: Dmitry Starodubtsev
founders.description: Dmitry Starodubtsev is a serial entrepreneur, inventor, and technologist that has developed over 50 new products including 20 US and international patents. Dmitry is also CTO and co-founder of Mighty Buildings, a construction technology company creating beautiful, affordable, and sustainable homes using 3D printing and robotic automation. Mighty Buildings is backed by reputable VCs such as Khosla Ventures, Bold Capital, and Y Combinator.

## Join our upcoming online fundraising bootcamp
and get exclusive access to the Socap.ai platform
Applications deadline is the 25th of June
Learn how top founders who have collectively raised over a billion fundraise by activating their social capital. You'll never default to cold-emailing ever again
Top industry founders (see below) are joining us to share their experience and invest their social capital in the startups they like
We'll provide you with the playbook, guidance and accountability groups ‚Äî everything you need to succeed
The active bootcamp part goes on for about 6 weeks but you stay in the community forever
It's free to join but subject to selection - limited spots available in each cohort
For more info on the curriculum, timeline and details of the bootcamp, [follow this link](https://www.socap.ai/<https:/socap.fibery.io/Product/Socap.ai-fundraising-bootcamp-172?sharing-key=1cb9a7e4-8320-45c0-867d-f36b1b8f4aa9>)
[I wanna join!](https://www.socap.ai/<https:/socap.fibery.io/@public/forms/kXJSpFVn>)

## Boost social capital sharing in your community
Ideal for VCs, accelerators and business clubs
We let your top portfolio founders share their stories/hacks with the rest of the founders via organized networking and social capital sharing days. Our AI facilitates the most relevant/powerful introduction requests.
[Schedule a demo call](https://www.socap.ai/<https:/cal.com/ednevsky/partner-with-socap.ai?date=2024-06-17&month=2024-06>)
## FAQ
**What's your pricing model and what do I get for free?**
You can start using Socap.ai for free through our basic tier, which includes essential networking features and limited AI-powered introductions. Our paid tiers start at a monthly subscription, offering advanced features like full AI connections processing, unlimited intro paths, collaboration features, and playbook access.
**How do I know that you are legitimate?**
Our community has collectively raised over $1B, including founders who've had successful exits to companies like Google and Amazon. We're backed by top Silicon Valley VCs and founded by repeat entrepreneurs who have raised $180M themselves. Our platform is trusted by hundreds of founders at Pre-Seed through Series A stages.
**How do you protect my sensitive network data?**
We implement enterprise-grade security protocols to protect your network informatio. Your data is only shared when you explicitly choose to do so, and you maintain full control over which connections and intro paths are visible to others. We adhere to strict data minimization principles and privacy-preserving techniques in our AI processing
**What differentiates your AI networking tool from LinkedIn?**
Our AI copilot analyzes your network across multiple data sources to unlock hidden introduction paths to virtually any investor. It streamlines your fundraising by automating investor research, revealing actionable network insights, and orchestrating warm introductions that are 10x more effective than cold outreach.
**Can I upgrade or downgrade my subscription at any time?**
Yes, you have full flexibility to change your subscription tier at any time. When upgrading, you'll get immediate access to premium features. If you downgrade, you'll maintain access to your current tier until the end of your billing cycle. There are no long-term commitments required.
Interested in joining our team? Email us at careers@socap.ai with a short blurb/CV.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66085fad681eeb753867ad8e/6670092debc8e4b1bf8d066e_logo-socapAI.webp)](https://www.socap.ai/<#>)

## Boost social capital sharing in your community
Ideal for VCs, accelerators and business clubs
We let your top portfolio founders share their stories/hacks with the rest of the founders via organized networking and social capital sharing days. Our AI facilitates the most relevant/powerful introduction requests.
Schedule a demo call‚ü®14‚ü©
## FAQ
**What's your pricing model and what do I get for free?**
You can start using Socap.ai for free through our basic tier, which includes essential networking features and limited AI-powered introductions. Our paid tiers start at a monthly subscription, offering advanced features like full AI connections processing, unlimited intro paths, collaboration features, and playbook access.
**How do I know that you are legitimate?**
Our community has collectively raised over $1B, including founders who've had successful exits to companies like Google and Amazon. We're backed by top Silicon Valley VCs and founded by repeat entrepreneurs who have raised $180M themselves. Our platform is trusted by hundreds of founders at Pre-Seed through Series A stages.
**How do you protect my sensitive network data?**
We implement enterprise-grade security protocols to protect your network informatio. Your data is only shared when you explicitly choose to do so, and you maintain full control over which connections and intro paths are visible to others. We adhere to strict data minimization principles and privacy-preserving techniques in our AI processing
**What differentiates your AI networking tool from LinkedIn?**
Our AI copilot analyzes your network across multiple data sources to unlock hidden introduction paths to virtually any investor. It streamlines your fundraising by automating investor research, revealing actionable network insights, and orchestrating warm introductions that are 10x more effective than cold outreach.
**Can I upgrade or downgrade my subscription at any time?**
Yes, you have full flexibility to change your subscription tier at any time. When upgrading, you'll get immediate access to premium features. If you downgrade, you'll maintain access to your current tier until the end of your billing cycle. There are no long-term commitments required.
Interested in joining our team? Email us at careers@socap.ai with a short blurb/CV.

generated_description:
### Socap.ai: Revolutionizing Network Growth and Fundraising with AI

**Mission**: Socap.ai aims to **grow your network and fundraise faster with advanced AI technology**, providing an innovative platform that streamlines these essential processes for startup founders and investors.

**Background**: Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's W23 batch, Socap.ai was born out of the founders' own experiences in raising capital and making connections. Slava, a former venture capitalist with a knack for unicorns, and Alex, a repeat AI entrepreneur, collectively bring a wealth of knowledge and connections to the table. They've raised over **$200M** among themselves and have become a go-to resource for founders seeking guidance in challenging fundraising climates.

**What They Offer**: 
- **AI-Powered Playbook**: Socap.ai provides a proven fundraising framework modeled after the successful "parallel fundraising" tactics used by top YC alumni. 
- **Community Support**: It's not just about tools; it‚Äôs about connection. The platform fosters an accountable community where founders can share insights and resources.
- **Networking Opportunities**: Users gain access to a platform that helps them manage and expand their connections, both with fellow founders and potential investors.

Currently in beta, Socap.ai is onboarding users through community initiatives, allowing them to access its features early. Notably, they host **free fundraising bootcamps** designed for entrepreneurs looking to sharpen their networking skills and fundraising strategies. Interested parties can apply on their website for the upcoming bootcamp sessions.

**Team and Location**: Socap.ai operates out of **San Francisco** with a tight-knit team of 10 employees, backed by prominent group partners like **Gustaf Alstromer**.

**Checked and Endorsed**: The community behind Socap.ai has raised over **$1B**, with many founders having successfully exited businesses to major players like Google and Amazon. The credibility of their model is reinforced by the involvement of seasoned founders and investors who act as ambassadors, sharing their experiences within the community.

### What Makes Socap.ai Stand Out?
1. **AI Copilot**: Unlike traditional networking sites, Socap.ai leverages AI to uncover hidden intro paths and automate investor research, making warm introductions exponentially more effective than cold emailing.
   
2. **Flexibility**: Interested founders can start for free, with an option to upgrade for advanced features as their needs evolve.

3. **Data Security**: While expanding your network, Socap.ai emphasizes protecting your sensitive information, ensuring users control their data.

### Conclusion
If you're a startup founder navigating the turbulent waters of fundraising, **Socap.ai** is not just another tool‚Äîit's an AI-powered ally designed to enhance both your networking capabilities and fundraising efforts. It's about tapping into social capital and leveraging meaningful connections, ultimately making the entire process not just easier but smarter. 

For more insights or to get involved, visit [Socap.ai](https://www.socap.ai) and consider signing up for their beta or upcoming bootcamps. You won‚Äôt just join a community; you join a movement.
